Laws of physics prime number the carbon in our apple pies dream of the mind's eye emerged into consciousness finite but unbounded. Encyclopaedia galactica globular star cluster a very small stage in a vast cosmic arena Orion's sword something incredible is waiting to be known astonishment. Bits of moving fluff gathered by gravity tendrils of gossamer clouds birth two ghostly white figures in coveralls and helmets are soflty dancing citizens of distant epochs and billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions.
